itunes:title: MAR 17 2022 - WAR IN UKRAINE - DAY 22 UPDATE
title: MAR 17 2022 - WAR IN UKRAINE - DAY 22 UPDATE
description:
The Institute for the Study of War (ISW) released a statement reporting that Russian forces are facing mounting difficulties due to combat losses in Ukraine. The Federal Reserve raises interest rates for the first time in three years to fight inflation and is forecasting six more hikes within the year. Meanwhile, the new and revised Iran Deal would allow Russia to contractually build nuclear sites, and El Huevo, leader of the Northeast Cartel, has been deported from Mexico to the United States.  Here’s your Daily dose of Human Events with @JackPosobiec 

Try ScoreMaster for free by going to www.scoremaster.com/POSO with code POSO

To save on MyPillow go to MyPillow.com/POSO and use code POSO

To get $50 off each of my favorite ‘My Patriot Supply’ kits go to PrepareWithPOSO.com and use code POSO
content:encoded:
